mapper.select: SELECT sm.id, sm.name, sm.url, sm.pid, sm.icon FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sur.user_id WHERE su.id = #{uid} and sm.type = 0 and sm.del_flag = 1 GROUP BY sm.id ORDER BY sm.sort

SELECT sm.authority FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srm ON sm.id = srm.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = sur.user_id WHERE sm.authority IS NOT NULL and sm.del_flag = 1 AND su.id = #{uid}
